title: 15-year-old boy shot dead in Trenton housing complex
content:
TRENTON -- A 15-year-old male died Saturday after he was shot outside a housing complex in North Trenton, city police say.
The incident occurred about 3:46 p.m. outside the Prospect Village Apartments on Prospect Street, Lt. Steven Varn said.
The victim was transported to Capital Health Regional Medical Center in Trenton, where he died of his wounds shortly after.
Varn said there was no information available about any suspects.
Mercer County's Homicide Task Force is investigating the killing.
